alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Lane; Ness; Rush; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:42PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ness, Trego, eastern Lane, western Rush and southwestern Ellis Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 942 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Riga to near Brownell to 6 miles southwest of Utica. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ransom around 945 PM CDT. Brownell and Riga around 950 PM CDT. Ellis and Beeler around 955 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include McCracken, Yocemento, Ness City, Bazine, Hays, Schoenchen, Alexander, Antonino, Munjor and Toulon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for central and west central Kansas.
